segments.text: This entire scene is like a still life of impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is truly a sight to behold, it's getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fearful that woman will finally notice when the whole floor is flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, are blissfully unaware of the rising water, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool looks so pleased with himself, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's a little scamp, isn't he, with his plate ready for the bounty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face is quite charming, despite the naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my goodness, that stool is absolutely teetering on the brink of collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a horrible mix of domestic routine and outright peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me is a bit disgusted by the potential mess if that sink isn't dealt with.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a miracle they haven't been caught yet, given all the commotion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they all come out of this without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
